title: How to Remove Detergent Residue from Clothes

steps.headline: Place the clothes into the washing machine.
Add 1/2 a cup of washing soda to the machine.
steps.description: This can be purchased from supermarkets in the washing detergents section.

steps.headline: Wash as usual after.
steps.description: The detergent residue should be gone by now, along with the chances of your clothes yellowing.

text: Place the clothes into the washing machine.  Add 1/2 a cup of washing soda to the machine. This can be purchased from supermarkets in the washing detergents section. Do a prewash cycle.  Wash as usual after. The detergent residue should be gone by now, along with the chances of your clothes yellowing.
